events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it arrived the wrong size and I would like to return it for a refund.
The system classified the customer's inquiry under the Refund category based on keywords in the message.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrectly sized jacket.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the sizing issue with your jacket. I'll be happy to assist you with the return process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the size you received so we can process the refund quickly?
Sure, the order number is 987654321, and I received a Medium instead of the Large I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We have initiated your return and refund. You will receive an email with the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the help and will send the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
The agent confirmed the refund request was processed successfully and the case is now resolved.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with your return experience.
The customer has confirmed receipt of the refund. The support case has been formally closed. Thank you for contacting us.
